root.name: Bad News Baseball
root.description: OverviewBad News Baseball is an arcade style baseball game, developed by Tecmo. The game is notable in that it features heavy anime influences, as seen in the in-game cutscenes. After home runs and during close plays in the field, cutscenes occur, showing the action. Also of note are the Bunny umpires, and attention to detail in the rosters. Teams and players are modeled after MLB teams, complete with similar color schemes and player attributes.
